content.raw:
I manually updated to use the new test files:
~~~
hg cat -r c5f8131dd291 test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc > test/integration/multicamera_sensor.cc
hg cat -r c5f8131dd291 test/worlds/camera_rotation_test.world > test/worlds/camera_rotation_test.world
~~~
but the test didn't fail for me.
